name: STRANDED (itch) (Aramsantze)
description:
Puzzle platformer

you control yourself and your companion at the same time.

Link to Liluo.io

Liluo.io

Made for Gdevelop Game Jam #2

Control

A and D/ arrow key for movement.

Space for jump and dialog.

[ t ] for teleport to your companion.

[ m ]  for menu

Tips

1. prioritize your companion to go up first before you.

2. if you lost your companion, just teleport to them (except on the hard mode).

Software

Ms paint

ChipTone and Audacity

Gdevelop
